verses.name: Ezekiel 12:13
verses.text: My net also will I spread upon him, and he shall be taken in my snare: and I will bring him to Babylon to the land of the Chaldeans; yet shall he not see it, though he shall die there.

verses.name: Ezekiel 12:14
verses.text: And I will scatter toward every wind all that are about him to help him, and all his bands; and I will draw out the sword after them.

verses.name: Ezekiel 12:15
verses.text: And they shall know that I am the Lord, when I shall scatter them among the nations, and disperse them in the countries.
